name: Detoxinator
description:
Fly around and detox the environment from enemies.

Improvements:

1.) Total of 10 levels.

2.) Interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels.

3.) Added a 3 way gun that the player can pick up and use, will be available for the full level then, even if the player loses a life he still has it for the rest of the level.

4.) Added walls that the enemies can go through and shoot through but the player has to shoot them 50x in order to break them.

Created by EDPGames

Credits: 

Teacher: Brian Winn
